safety_blurb: Keep distance. Hemotoxic venom. If bitten, stay calm, immobilize limb, and call 911.
Copperheads are often camouflaged. Do not handle. If bitten, call 911 and keep the limb still.
Back away slowly. Do not attempt capture. Seek emergency care immediately if bitten.
Neurotoxic venom possible. Maintain distance; if bitten, call 911 without delay.
Aggressive when cornered. Do not approach. If bitten, keep calm and call 911.
Keep distance. Hemotoxic venom. If bitten, stay calm, immobilize limb, and call emergency services.
Back away slowly. Do not attempt capture. Seek emergency care immediately if bitten.
Maintain distance. Hemotoxic venom. If bitten, immobilize and seek immediate medical attention.
